title: Web scraper to export data to Excel
snippet:
I need a data scraper that crawls and extracts data, then exports the data into an excel file.

I have around 30,000 links, each page has around 30 products, the crawler needs to click those 30 links and grab 4 pieces of data to put into a row.

The 30,000 links times 30 products should result in around 750,000 rows of data. I want to be able to crawl only about 1,000 links a day, I don't want the server to get overloaded.
